file = parse("schependom_foundation.ifc")
surfaces = create_geometry(file, exclude={"IfcOpeningElement", "IfcSpace"})
voxels_lowres = voxelize(surfaces, VOXELSIZE=0.1)
voxels_highres = voxelize(surfaces, VOXELSIZE=0.025)
voxels_highres_resampled = resample(voxels_highres, -4)
difference = subtract(voxels_highres_resampled, voxels_lowres)
